results.alt: Cover artwork for The Automan's Daughter, chapter 1
Three-panel sequence of Aisha Osman pushing her smoking monocycle along a desert highway
Siddig Khan floats in an inner tube and ignores the ringing of the suitcase phone floating in his swimming pool, which is mounted on top of his limousine, as it speeds down the highway.

results.caption: The Automan's Daughter 2025 promo artwork

results.alt: Aisha pulls off her goggles and squints into the distance. She sees a bar/fuel station up on top of a rocky hill.
Aisha makes a phone call from the wheeler bar. Ali, Sid's chauffeur, tells Aisha he's on his way.
This should be the same as the image's alt text.
Aisha tumbles onto the ground just as the limo pulls up abruptly, dousing the wheelers with swimming-pool water.
Sid sits at the bottom of his limo pool, confused. The wheelers look ready to attack, when suddenly the limo begins to unfold...
The limo, now standing atop six mecha-legs, looms over Aisha and the wheelers. She looks over her shoulder at them, defiantly.
The wheelers run off. Ali asks Aisha if she needs a ride. "Yes," she replies meekly.
A vest-clad Sid stares directly down the barrel of a gigantic cannon aimed at him.
Sid has a flashback to a small hand wiping away his tears, then awakens in the limo with a start.
Ali, Sid and Aisha exit the limo, having arrived at their destination.
